name: GetLineItemDetails
description:
Retrieve details of a line item by its ID.

This tool fetches details of a specific line item from HubSpot CRM using its internal ID or any unique property value. Use this tool to access information about a particular line item, specifying any desired properties to control the response.

parameters.name: line_item_id
parameters.description: The unique ID or property value of the line item to retrieve. This identifies the specific line item in HubSpot CRM.

parameters.name: return_properties
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to return. Ignored if not present on the object.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: properties_with_history
parameters.description: A list of properties to return with their value history. Ignored if not present on the object.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned along with their history of previous values. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: associated_object_types
parameters.description: Comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. Non-existent associations are ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

parameters.name: unique_identifier_property
parameters.description: Specifies a unique property name to identify the line item in HubSpot CRM.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

parameters.name: only_return_archived
parameters.description: Set to True to return only archived results.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.
